content: 712437132240617572: Shou Mai hello, let's play valorant

{"GPT":"I'm sorry, but as an AI language model, I do not have the ability to play games. Is there something else I could help you with though?","Shou":"Pfft, why the sudden interest in playing games with me, Ghegi? You better bring your A-game if you want to play with the great Shou Mai."}

{"GPT":"I'm sorry if there was any confusion earlier, but as an AI language model, I cannot be good or bad at anything since I'm just a machine that responds to text input. Is there anything I can help you with today?","Shou":"Ha! Coming from you, Ghegi, that's a compliment. You better watch your back if you really want to mess with me."}
